instructions -work a single_crochet -work another single_crochet stitch inserting your hook in same stitch -work the third single_crochet stitch inserting your hook in same stitch color change instructions -stop crocheting right before you pull through the last two loops on the crochet hook drop the old color of yarn -put the new yarn color on the hook and use the new color to pull through the last two loops on the hook materials i used 3 premier yarns parfait chunky poppy approx 19 g premier yarns parfait chunky espresso approx 24 g buy hobbii premier yarns parfait chunky honey turquiose bunny approx 10 g here premier yarns parfait chunky bubblegum approx 1 g buy parfait hobbii honey bunny chunky nougat approx 36 g here premier yarns parfait chunky white nougat approx 13 g felt i use stiffened felt with heat and bond on the back and cut the leafs 1in x 0 99in other supplies 16mm safety eyes 4mm crochet hook stitch markers yarn felt templates needle stuffing scissors
